INCREDIBLE experience! Daniel did an amazing job explaining to me the different types of coverings and shades.  He was very patient in helping me figure out what would work best for my needs.  Very fair prices and the service and install … More Response from the owner 2 weeks ago Can't wait to see how the living room turns out! Thank you for your business and it was a pleasure working with you and your wife.

NDSB did an awesome job installing custom shades in my home! They were super friendly, showed up on time, and helped me pick the perfect shades. The quality is top-notch, and they fit like a glove. The whole process was quick, clean, and hassle-free. Totally love the new vibe in my house—would definitely recommend them! Response from the owner 3 months ago Thank you! It was a pleasure working with you on your project.
